name: Student Performance
query:
SELECT
   
    full_name AS "Full Name:Data:140",
    
    enrollment_number AS "Enrollment Number:Data:120",
    date_of_birth AS "Date Of Birth:Date:100",
    mobile_number AS "Mobile Number:Data:120",
    progress AS "Progress (%%):Percent:100",
    
    status AS "Status:Select:100",
    grade AS "Grade:Data:60"
FROM
    `tabStudent`
WHERE
    docstatus < 2
ORDER BY
    name
